data.name: YONESAWARA HOSPITAL
data.detailed_description:
About the game.
YONESAWARA HOSPITAL is a single-player exploration horror game from the first-person perspective.
The game focuses on the search for the abandoned hospital "Yonesawara Hospital", and by finding various clues, the truth about what happened at the hospital will be revealed.

Story.
In 1978, the clinic went out of business due to the sudden disappearance of its director.
Ten years later, a phone call to an investigator sets the story in motion.
What happened to the director?
The investigators go to the abandoned clinic to track down the disappearances that took place in the past.

Stage of the game.
We created an abandoned clinic based on various ruins in Japan.

・Two to three hours of gameplay.
Exploration mode for those who are not good at horror games.
We have implemented a ruin exploration mode with no horror elements at all, which can be played even by those who are not good at horror games.
You can explore the ruins in various situations such as morning, noon, and night.
You can use the camera function to take pictures of the ruins in the Ruins Search Mode.

data.short_description: In 1978, a doctor's office was closed due to the sudden disappearance of the director. Ten years later, a phone call to an investigator sets the story in motion. What happened to the director? The investigators go to the abandoned clinic to track down the disappearances that occurred in the past.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or greater
  • Memory: ８ GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: ２ GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card. Stereo headphones are recommended.
  • Additional Notes: Available in 16:9 aspect ratio only. 30FPS in 1920x1080 with the highest settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or greater
  • Memory: ８ GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1650 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: ２ GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card. Stereo headphones are recommended. To enable spatial sound, you need to enable Windows Sonic, Dolby Atmos, or DTS Sound Unbound.
  • Additional Notes: Available in 16:9 aspect ratio only. 60FPS in 1920x1080 with the highest settings.

content_descriptors.notes: YONESAWARA HOSPITAL contains intense violence, blood and gore.
